long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is extension used for specific application. It is used for automation testing application. Using this extension user can record browser actions. It will be recorded using this extension and than automation testing will be performed. It will store all user actions. User needs to download it from chrome webstore and enable it. This extension is built using Angular, Javascript. It is part of an Web Application.
